metadata.title: CVE-2021-25281 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in through SaltStack Salt before 3002.5. salt-apidoes not honor eauth credentials for the wheel_async client. Thus, anattacker can remotely run any wheel modules on the master.

criterions.comment: salt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
